item.title: Congratulations to Abdul Aziz and Md. Akram Hossain!
item.description: This is to inform you that their first Journal paper has now been accepted for publication in the Natural Language Processing Journal (Publisher: Elsevier). It was indeed a long journey and after consecutive disappointment from various journals.

item.title: Congratulations to Akram, Aziz, Nabila, Radia, Afrin, Tahsin, Piyal, and Fareen for successfully completing their undergraduate studies!
1st Place (Winning Team) at CheckThat!2023@CLEF2023 Task 1A Arabic
item.description:
Title: CSECU-DSG at CheckThat! 2023: Transformer-based Fusion Approach for Multimodal and Multigenre Check-Worthiness

Team Member: Abdul Aziz, MD. Akram Hossain, and Abu Nowshed Chy

item.title: 2nd Place at ALTA 2022 Shared Task
item.description:
Title: Enhancing the DeBERTa Transformers Model for Classifying Sentences from Biomedical Abstracts

Team Member: MD. Akram Hossain, Abdul Aziz, and Abu Nowshed Chy

item.title: 1st Place (Winning Team) at CASE2022@EMNLP2022 Task 3 Subtask A
item.description:
Title: CSECU-DSG @ Causal News Corpus 2022: Fusion of RoBERTa Transformers Variants for Causal Event Classification

Team Member: MD. Akram Hossain, Abdul Aziz, and Abu Nowshed Chy

item.title: 4th Place in PreTENS@SemEval-2022 Subtask 1
item.description:
Title: CSECU-DSG at SemEval-2022 Task 3: Investigating the Taxonomic Relationship Between Two Arguments using Fusion of Multilingual Transformer Models

Team Member: MD. Akram Hossain, Abdul Aziz, and Abu Nowshed Chy

item.title: 1st Place (Winning Team) in CEREX@FIRE2020 Task A
item.description:
Title: Feature Fusion with Hand-crafted and Transfer Learning Embeddings for Cause-Effect Relation Extraction

Team Member: MD. Akram Hossain, Abdul Aziz, Afrin Sultana, Nabila Ayman, and Abu Nowshed Chy

FIRE 2020 workshop has proposed a CEREX task, in which the challenge is to extract the automatic cause-effect relation from the text. Here our team CSECU.DSG become the topmost performer and achieved first place in subtask1.
